attributes.action: Let’s stop all overseas aid until the Covid-19 pandemic is over.
attributes.additional_details: It makes sense. You were elected by these people. Look after them!
attributes.background: To simply stop over seas aid and divert the money to the needy on our shores.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
Use money from the foreign aid budget to Support UK in the Covid 19 crisis:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304418
